{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = N300 Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-N12-plus-B1/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-N12+_B1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Was |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-N12+ |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = B1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 10, 2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_RT-N12%2B_B1 |wlclass = N300 |series = RT-N12 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RT1P00 |icid = 3568A-RTN300B1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = AP-MT0P-C00H |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628NN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 575 <!-- 575 / 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q64CSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9425G6KH-5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = none
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 57600 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = T&W |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan (WiP), OpenWrt (Was)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/01/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP-MT0P-C00H", "REV1.0", "RoHS" and "1606" (02/2016) :is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3046796 FCC photos] ([[T&W]])
FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RT1P00 MSQ-RT1P00] (2016-07-01) {{•}} [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3046803 FCC Users Manual] *Brand: ASUS *Product: Wireless-N Router *Sample Status: Engineering sample *Test Model: [[ASUS RT-N300 B1|RT-N300 B1]] *Series Model: RT-N12+ B1, [[ASUS RT-N12+ V3|RT-N12+ V3]] {{see also|ASUS RT-N12 series|ASUS RT-N12+ V3|ASUS RT-N300 B1}}
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-n12plus_b1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt76x8 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.7 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Same hardware, firmware, and FCC ID with Asus RT-N11P B1. Their FCC ID also used by RT-N300 B1 (Probably prototype or limited item sold in US/CA) }} Please insert instructions here
